member.summary: Nancy forms authentication implementation

member.summary: Enables forms authentication for the application

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthentication.UserLoggedInRedirectResponse(Nancy.NancyContext,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Creates a response that sets the authentication cookie and redirects the user back to where they came from.
member.param: Optional expiry date for the cookie (for 'Remember me')
Url to redirect to if none in the querystring

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthentication.UserLoggedInResponse(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Logs the user in.
member.param: Optional expiry date for the cookie (for 'Remember me')

member.summary: Logs the user out and redirects them to a URL

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthentication.LogOutResponse
member.summary: Logs the user out.

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthentication.GetLoadAuthenticationHook(Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration)
member.summary: Gets the pre request hook for loading the authenticated user's details from the cookie.

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthentication.GetRedirectToLoginHook(Nancy.Authentication.Forms.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration)
member.summary: Gets the post request hook for redirecting to the login page

member.summary: Gets the authenticated user GUID from the incoming request cookie if it exists and is valid.
member.returns: Returns user guid, or Guid.Empty if not present or invalid

member.summary: Builds a cookie for logging a user out

member.summary: Generate a hmac for the encrypted cookie string

member.summary: Decrypt and validate an encrypted and signed cookie value

member.name: T:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions
member.summary: Module extensions for login/logout of forms auth

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.Login(Nancy.INancyModule,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Logs the user in and returns either an empty 200 response for ajax requests, or a redirect response for non-ajax.
member.param: Optional expiry date for the cookie (for 'Remember me')
Url to redirect to if none in the querystring
member.returns: Nancy response with redirect if request was not ajax, otherwise with OK.

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.LoginAndRedirect(Nancy.INancyModule,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Logs the user in with the given user guid and redirects.
member.param: Optional expiry date for the cookie (for 'Remember me')
Url to redirect to if none in the querystring

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.LoginWithoutRedirect(Nancy.INancyModule,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Logs the user in with the given user guid and returns ok response.
member.param: Optional expiry date for the cookie (for 'Remember me')

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.Logout(Nancy.INancyModule,System.String)
member.summary: Logs the user out and returns either an empty 200 response for ajax requests, or a redirect response for non-ajax.
member.returns: Nancy response with redirect if request was not ajax, otherwise with OK.

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.LogoutAndRedirect(Nancy.INancyModule,System.String)
member.summary: Logs the user out and redirects

member.name: M:Nancy.Authentication.Forms.ModuleExtensions.LogoutWithoutRedirect(Nancy.INancyModule)
member.summary: Logs the user out without a redirect
